name: The Mission (Escape from the Lab)
description:
The Mission (Escape from the Lab)

A 2D Platformer, made with Godot

Controls for PC

W/Up Arrow  --- Jump
D/Right Arrow --- Move right
A/Left Arrow --- Move left
Click to throw a knife

Mobile Controls

Up Arrow  --- Jump

Right Arrow --- Move right

Left Arrow --- Move left

Tap to throw a knife
